sentence.text: Collagen type 4 alpha 1 (branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis) and collagen type 13 alpha 1 (cell-matrix adhesion) produced by urothelial cancer cells support the vital oncogenic property of tumor invasion.

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis

sentence.text: We investigated the diagnostic and prognostic capability of branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis and cell-matrix adhesion in voided urine and compared the observed values with those of fragments of cytokeratin-19 (CYFRA21-1), nuclear matrix protein 22 (NMP-22), and voided urine cytology in bladder cancer (BCa).

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis

sentence.text: Among these biomarkers, the optimal cut-off value of branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis + cell-matrix adhesion at 1.33 ng/mL resulted in 57.4%, 83.7%, 56.1%, 80.7%, and 91.7% sensitivity for low-grade tumors, high-grade tumors, Ta, T1, and muscle invasive disease, respectively.

entity.text: branching involved in blood vessel morphogenesis
